markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 6" pfs="Standard">[Lure Dream](/Spells.aspx?ID=1091)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Dream" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=299" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Monsters of Myth](/Sources.aspx?ID=107) pg. 89</row>

**Tradition**
[Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Three Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** sustained up to 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You reach out to the dream realm, beckoning an animate dream to your side. This works like [_summon animal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=316), except you summon an [animate dream](/Monsters.aspx?ID=546).
name: Lure Dream
